caption: start live stream
doc: Start a live stream, this action is available to Daily users on paid plans. Learn more at Daily.co/pricing

APN.caption: rtmp url
APN.doc: Retrieve this from your streaming provider (ie youtube, twitch etc) This should be in the format rtmp://RTMP_ENDPOINT/STREAM_KEY  or rtmps://RTMP_ENDPOINT/STREAM_KEY
APN.name: rtmplink

APT.caption: layout
APT.doc: The default layout is the default grid layout, which renders participants in a grid, or in a single column vertical grid to the right, if a screen share is enabled.   Active participant layout focuses on the current speaker, and places up to 9 other cameras to the right in a single column vertical grid in the order in which they last spoke.
APT.name: layout
